channel.title: 2h
channel.description:
ok here it is.. sorry for all my posts people may seem like spam but i have alot of questions sorry to all that think i'm spamming..
heres my question:: ok well i have a 2 handed weapon (ags) and on the client it's one handed only in your hand how exactly do i make it to where you hold in both hands?
